You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

events.eventText:
“Its close,” Lorn whispers as you silently enter the ancient Jedi Temple. “The Jedi Council wanted to keep the shard close, even if hidden. Think of it: the Force essence of dozens, maybe hundreds, of beings, all concentrated into one object. Think of what one could do with even a sliver of that kind of power.” He speaks with a terrified awe in his voice.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: Location Lorn

eventActions.tbText:
Lorn looks anxious and excited at the same time.

{-} The Imperial mission token represents Lorn. Lorn is a neutral figure. A hero adjacent to Lorn can spend 1 movement point to push Lorn up to 2 spaces.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: Location Lorn

eventActions.tbText: "There's an unknown number of secret passages in this temple that allowed the Jedi to move unseen between chambers", Lorn explains. "Some of those may still be intact."

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A hidden door leads to a secret passage through the ancient temple.

{-} A Rebel figure on a secret passage can spend 3 movement points to place his figure as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.
{-} If Lorn is on a secret passage, a hero adjacent to him can spend 2 movement points to place him as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.

A hidden door leads to a secret passage through the ancient temple.

{-} A Rebel figure on a secret passage can spend 3 movement points to place his figure as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.
{-} If Lorn is on a secret passage, a hero adjacent to him can spend 2 movement points to place him as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.

A hidden door leads to a secret passage through the ancient temple.

{-} A Rebel figure on a secret passage can spend 3 movement points to place his figure as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.
{-} If Lorn is on a secret passage, a hero adjacent to him can spend 2 movement points to place him as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Facedown neutral mission tokens represent secret passages.
{-} A Rebel figure on a secret passage can spend 3 movement points to place his figure as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.
{-} If Lorn is on a secret passage, a hero adjacent to him can spend 2 movement points to place him as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
An ancient terminal might hold some clues about the shard's location.

{-} When Lorn enters a space with a terminal, the heroes claim that terminal.

An ancient terminal might hold some clues about the shard's location.

{-} When Lorn enters a space with a terminal, the heroes claim that terminal.

An ancient terminal might hold some clues about the shard's location.

{-} When Lorn enters a space with a terminal, the heroes claim that terminal.

An ancient terminal might hold some clues about the shard's location.

{-} When Lorn enters a space with a terminal, the heroes claim that terminal.

eventActions.tbText:
"We can only hope there's still some data in the terminals here.", Lorn says.

{-} When Lorn enters a space with a terminal, the heroes claim that terminal.
{-} The mission will progress when all terminals have been claimed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

The eerie ambience of the deserted temple is broken by a shout of “Freeze!” from a stormtrooper and a blaster blot whizzing past. A firefight quickly erupts, and you push Lorn to the ground for cover.

“Keep me safe!” he yells as blasters continue to fire. “You will never find it without my help!”

eventActions.shortText: Have Lorn investigate the terminals (&Terminals claimed&/4).

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Imperial mission token represents Lorn. Lorn is a neutral figure. A hero adjacent to Lorn can spend 1 movement point to push Lorn up to 2 spaces.
{-} Facedown neutral mission tokens represent secret passages.
{-} A Rebel figure on a secret passage can spend 3 movement points to place his figure as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.
{-} If Lorn is on a secret passage, a hero adjacent to him can spend 2 movement points to place him as close as possible to another space with a secret passage.
{-} When Lorn enters a space with a terminal, the heroes claim that terminal.
{-} The mission will progress when all terminals have been claimed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: You wrench the Bardottan sphere fragment from the traitor Lorns hands and run as fast as you can from the furious Emperor Palpatine. When you finally reach a location where you can regroup, you look down at the shard you hold in your hand, panting from exertion. You feel the Force energy emanating from the glowing shard, sending tingles through your arm. A sense of power and terror overcomes you from simply holding it. You must get the shard off the planet and out of the Emperor's reach. {-} The Rebels win the mission! {-} The heroes receive the “Bardottan Shard” Reward card. (This Reward card works differently when playing with Imperial Commander. Refer to the Rules Change section of the wiki documentation for details.) {-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero. {-} Place Story Mission card “Capital Escape” into play.

The onslaught proves to be too much, and you are brought to your knees before the Emperor. He laughs with a vile smile on his face as Lorn presents the Bardottan sphere shard to him. Stormtroopers bind your arms behind you as the Emperor admires his prize.

“With this power, I will crush your pitiful rebellion,” he says with relish in his voice. “Your public executions will send the message to the entire galaxy that my power is absolute!”

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} Place Story Mission card “The Realm of the Dark Side” into play.

eventActions.mainText: Does Lorn have 1 or more strain tokens on him?

events.eventText: Lorn mutters softly as his eyes scan the data on the terminal, and finally he nods. "Yes!", he says. "Yes, this helps a lot!"

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
An ancient terminal might hold some clues about the shard's location.

{-} When Lorn enters a space with a terminal, the heroes claim that terminal.

events.eventText: The Emperor's forces are on your heels. Figures in red armor wielding long shock lances enter the temple.

"Finally! This is it!" Lorn sounds genuinely enthusiastic. "I know where it is!"

Before you can even move into the direction he is pointing, shouts and footsteps are heard as more enemies pour in.

eventActions.repositionText: Block access to the hiding place.

events.eventText: "There! It has to be over there!" Cowering behind an ancient statue, Lorn points into the temple. "Take me there!"

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
According to Lorn, the shard of the Bardottan Sphere is buried under some rubble in this rundown part of the temple.

{-} When Lorn is on the space of a Rebel mission token, he retrieves the shard.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the hiding place.
{-} When Lorn is on the space of a Rebel mission token, he retrieves the shard.
{-} The mission will progress when Lorn retrieves the shard.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Imperial mission token represents Lorn. Lorn is a neutral figure. A hero adjacent to Lorn can spend 1 movement point to push Lorn up to 2 spaces.

{-} When Lorn is on the space of a Rebel mission token, he retrieves the shard.

{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: You feel a shiver as Lorn lifts the glowing green shard from a hidden compartment. You motion for Lorn to follow you back to your ship, but your attention is drawn away by a malicious cackle echoing through the temple. You turn to see Emperor Palpatine himself.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
According to Lorn, the shard of the Bardottan Sphere is buried under some rubble in this rundown part of the temple.

{-} When Lorn is on the space of a Rebel mission token, he retrieves the shard.

According to Lorn, the shard of the Bardottan Sphere is hidden in an ancient wall safe in the Jedi office.

{-} When Lorn is on the space of a Rebel mission token, he retrieves the shard.

According to Lorn, the shard of the Bardottan Sphere is hidden in the foot of a column near the old fountain.

{-} When Lorn is on the space of a Rebel mission token, he retrieves the shard.

eventActions.newInstructions: {-} If adjacent to Lorn: Push Lorn 2 spaces toward <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>.

eventActions.customText:
{-} MASTER OF PUPPETS: Push Lorn 4 spaces toward this figure.
{A} RULE THROUGH FEAR: The other Imperial figure with the highest figure cost that is not <color="red">Focused</color> becomes <color="red">Focused</color>. 
{-} EMPEROR: The other Imperial figure with the highest figure cost that can attack attacks the Rebel closest to Lorn.
{A} FORCE LIGHTNING: One Rebel within 6 spaces suffers 2 {H} and becomes <color="red">Weakened</color>. If there is another Rebel within 2 spaces of the target, repeat this instruction targeting that Rebel. Limit once per Rebel.

eventActions.tbText:
"You have served me well," he says with a satisfied smile. You aren't sure what he means until Lorn begins walking in the Emperor’s direction.

"I live to serve," Lorn says as he walks past. You try to grab him, but find yourself strangely frozen in place.

"As for the rest of you," Palpatine says, "your service has also been appreciated, but is no longer required. Now... you will die!"

{-} Push Lorn 4 spaces toward <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color>.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
This is the control token for Lorn.

{-} A hero can interact with Lorn ({K}) to try and reclaim the shard. Apply +1 {B} to the results if there is another hero adjacent to Lorn. Apply -2 {B} to the results if <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> is adjacent to Lorn.

eventActions.mainText:
You try and wrest the shard from Lorn's hands.

{-} Test {K}. Apply +1 {B} to the results if there is another hero adjacent to Lorn. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on Lorn. Apply -2 {B} to the results if <color="red">Emperor Palpatine</color> is adjacent to Lorn.

inputList.theText:
Lorn holds the shard with more strength than you ever expected from the scrawny scholar.

{-} Place 1 strain token on Lorn for each {B} result gained.

events.eventText: Because there is at least 1 strain token on Lorn, the heroes gain 25 credits per hero.
The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
